title: Authorizes district attorney to petition for posting of security when animal is impounded as result of abuse
summary: Authorizes the district attorney bringing animal abuse charges to petition for the posting of security for the care of the abused animal on behalf of the impounding organization; authorizes all such petitions to be filed at or after the arraignment on animal abuse charges.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to authorizing district attorneys to petition for the posting of security for the care of impounded animals
